content:
The provided code chunk is situated within the `__bootstrap()` method of a thread class, which handles the initialization steps for the thread's execution. The chunk registers trace and profile hooks using `_sys.settrace()` and `_sys.setprofile()`, respectively, as part of setting up the thread environment before it begins running.

if _trace_hook:
                self._note("%s.__bootstrap(): registering trace hook", self)
                _sys.settrace(_trace_hook)
            if _profile_hook:
                self._note("%s.__bootstrap(): registering profile hook", self)
                _sys.setprofile(_profile_hook)
